name: Evergreen Urban planning Laws
description: Every laws related to the infrastructures and the urban planning of Evergreen.

properties.Title: No claims allowed on public districts
properties.UserDescription: Protect the stores, park, city buildings and others from claims.

properties.Title: Informations regarding the shop districts
properties.UserDescription: Informations for people wanting to claim in the Shops Districts.

Districts.internalDescription:
<foldout><linktext><u>2 Districts</u></linktext><title>2 Districts</title><link="view:732:653189"><icon name="District" type=""><color=#A73A26FF>Evergreen - Shops 1</color></icon></link>
<link="view:732:653193"><icon name="District" type=""><color=#7CFAFAFF>Evergreen - Shops 2</color></icon></link></foldout>

properties.Message:
The following plot is part of the "Evergreen shops 1 or 2 district” and will require an update to match a certain pattern and look to esthetically fit with the others buildings in the area. The goal is to get more cultural bonus by doing so and also have a really good-looking town. These are the baseline of what is expected. If your project needs to deviate from these, please discuss with the the Mayor and/or Deputy Mayor to confirm it complies with the expected quality level of the town.

Starting day 5, every citizen is required to follow these rules or face an administrative fine of 250€. Two days later unless fixed, the town will give another fine of 300€ and use executive action to fix the shop and charge the cost at the expense of the owner. (Exception can be given for custom designs. That need to be discussed with the Mayor and/or Deputy Mayor.
On the main street, east side and west side of the roundabout (next to the town hall), shops are required to be at level (will be determinated).
Every building in the following districts: Evergreen Shops - 1 and Evergreen Shops - 2 will need to be mostly tier 2 at least, and have a front face similar to the template that will be provided.

The following rules apply to everyone building or using plots inside Evergreen : 
Fines of 250€ per day of non compliance can be given until the situation is fixed.
- No stockpiles on roofs
- No windmill or waterwheel on the shops plot (after day 7)
- Basement need to be fully enclosed
- Nothing can be put on the roofs without an exception given by the government

PeopleToSendTo.contextDescription: The citizen who claimed or unclaimed the land.

properties.Title: Requirement to get access to the Farmland
properties.UserDescription:
Protect the Farmland and the crops to be managed/gathered by Evergreen - Farmers only.

To be allowed to gather or farm in this district, you need to agree to follow the rules : 

- Be a farmer or a gatherer at least level 2.
- You promise to harvest only mature crops.
- You promise to replant your harvest.

*Harvesting crops that have not been planted by you is as considerated stealing and legal actions might be taken against you. You could loose the title and get fine if any of those rules are broken.
